name: byr-pt-cli
description: BYR CLI with OpenClaw-friendly JSON contract

scripts.build: tsdown src/index.ts src/cli.ts src/domain/client.ts src/domain/types.ts src/commands/browse.ts src/commands/doctor.ts src/commands/download.ts src/commands/get.ts src/commands/search.ts --format esm --dts
scripts.check: pnpm typecheck && pnpm check:publish-manifest && pnpm test
